1512660.name: The Light of Summer
1512660.description:
This Is A Short Horror Adventure Game.

In one map room, the trials come one after another.
Make good use of what's around you and get through the ordeal.
The game is over when you run out of health in the upper left corner.

✳︎feature✳︎

✳︎adventure

✳︎15min~30min

✳︎1map

✳︎a Little Horror

✳︎a Short Game

✳︎a Few Voices(only Japanese)

✳︎multi-ending(3 Endings)

→↓↑←...move

z/enter ...check/decide

✳︎story✳︎

Terukichi Had Something He Wanted to Be .

However, in order to achieve the objective, it was necessary to take the exam.
